title: How to write a unique article for my blog - Quora

response.answer_text: To write a unique and amazing article, follow the following steps: Hook people in with the first 2–3 lines of your blog. For e.g., “Do you want to know how to make a pizza your kids are going to love?” But remember…don't be spammy with it! You can hook people with some other better sentences too. They don’t necessarily need to be questioned.Write a table of contents for each post so that people can jump right into the part they want to read. It creates a better user experience.Create sub-headings.Write 1or 2 snippet optimized textsAlways write the conclusion at the end of the textEnd the post with a question and ask the readers to comment their answers. This will increase engagement.
